header.subtitle: Quick start guide
header.title: First Time Visiting?
header.body:
Before interacting with all the portal functionalities, you'll have to ensure you have the correct setup (wallet, testnet, tokens).

 We can help you jump-start the process!

steps.title: Setup MetaMask
steps.subtitle: To interact with the portal, you need to install and create an account with MetaMask.
steps.body:
Click on the button to download MetaMask from the official website.

 Once you've set up an account, you are ready to move to the next step.

steps.title: Connect your account to the portal
steps.subtitle: Now that you created an account with MetaMask, you are ready to connect to the portal.
steps.body:
After you click on this button a popup from MetaMask will appear.

 To connect to the portal confirm the request inside the popup.
